overview: Can you show me how to give a great BJ? Lexi and Taylor: After asking Taylor to demonstrate some sex acts for her, Lexi finds herself in a threesome with Taylor and her husband. Nicole and India: India and Chris put an ad in the paper for a bathing suit model only to seduce her into a threesome. Ava and Tanner: Ava walks in on her husband while he gives Tanner a special lesson, and she decides to participate. McKenzie and Proxy: McKenzie is spending the night at her friend's place. She can't sleep so she decides to have a threesome with her friend's parents. Marie and Rayveness: Rayveness and Justin conspire to set up a sexual situation with the babysitter!
title: Couples Seeking Teens 4
